title: Textile, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 134 x 75.5 cm (52 3/4 x 29 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 167 x 63.5 cm (5 ft. 5 3/4 in. x 25 in.)
Repeat H x W: 23 x 20.5 cm (9 1/16 x 8 1/16 in.)
description: Brick repeat of clusters of blue roses superimposed on a fine brown floral vine creating a curved diamond grid between the roses. Alternate rows of roses are couterfaced. Maximum repeat unit: 23cm (9") high x 20.5cm (8") wide.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1976-70-5-a.
